languages.name: PHP
languages.description: The main language I use within my job - I have gone from knowing nothing about PHP, to feeling very confident in it.

languages.name: React
languages.description: The language the website has been built in! I've taken multiple online courses in React and am learning all of the time!

languages.name: SQL
languages.description: This is another language used often within my job. Although it's usually wrapped in CodeIgniter syntax, I have become familiar with standard SQL when querying databases.

languages.name: JavaScript
languages.description: A language that I'm slowly coming to terms with - often I use jQuery instead of pure Javascript (or a combination of the two).

languages.name: MATLAB
languages.description: The language used for my Dissertation! MATLAB was my go-to programming language of choice during my years studying Mathematics at university.

languages.name: C++
languages.description: A language I studied during university, C++ introduced me to object based programming.

languages.name: C#
languages.description: I self-taught C# by redoing university assignments in this language, but have not looked at it very much recently.

languages.name: Python
languages.description: A language I've never formally 'learnt', whenever I have come across Python I have more-or-less followed along and is one I have in my sights to learn more about!

additional.name: GitHub
additional.description: Used briefly during my dissertation, I now use GitHub on a daily basis during my role as a Junior Software Developer.

additional.name: jQuery
additional.description: Arguable the syntax I had the most trouble understanding initially, I now am confident in jQuery and much prefer it to regular JavaScript.

additional.name: CodeIgniter
additional.description: The Framework I work on in my job, I have developed an understanding of the framework and will continue to do so as I work closely with it.

additional.name: Laravel
additional.description: A Framework I'm very interested in learning, so I have started an online course in the latest version.
